Name: THINGS-MEG
EthicsApprovals: NIH Institutional Review Board as part of the study protocol 93-M-0170 (NCT00001360)
ReferencesAndLinks: fMRI & MEG Paper: Hebart, M. N., Contier, O., Teichmann, L., Rockter, A. H., Zheng, C. Y., Kidder, A., ... & Baker, C. I. (2023). THINGS-data, a multimodal collection of large-scale datasets for investigating object representations in human brain and behavior. Elife, 12, e82580.

Image Database Paper: Hebart M. N., Dickter A. H., Kidder A., Kwok W.  Y., Corriveau A., et al. (2019) THINGS: A database of 1,854 object concepts and more than 26,000 naturalistic object images. PLOS ONE 14(10): e0223792. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0223792
